DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether low-dose contraceptive pills are effective in the improvement of quality of life in patients in the different phases of menacme.
DOC.brief_title: Improvement of Quality of Life in Patients Using Low-dose Pills in the Different Phases of Menacme
DOC.criteria: Fertile women with indication of use of contraceptive pills Fertile women with any surgical contraceptive method Women in menopause Diseases the forbidden the use of the drug
